Message.Msg: No one knows of course, but to me the pull is towards $900. Then over $900. Then toward $1000. It's psychological.

Message.Title: Google's new Nexus 7 could translate into a loss of $5 to $10 per unit.
Message.Msg: Google is expected to bolster the display resolution to 1,920 x 1,200 for the 7-inch display. There should be some improvements in thickness and weight, and Google is likely going to stand pat at the $199 price point. That would translate into a loss of $5 to $10 per unit.

Message.Title: Google Developer Conference + Nexus 7... Goog will touch 900 soon...almost there
Message.Msg: It ain't going back until 900 is touched first..
